page.title: 11Central Wednesbury.
page.content: The road system has been changed in the last ten years to by-pass the centre of Wednesbury. The High Bullen is now a busy dual carriageway. There are new civic amenities. A sports hall is now being built next to the new swimming baths. The trading estate has steel stock and manufacturing, a unit making rubber products and a cash and carry warehouse. The spires of{St Mary's}and {St Bartholemew's}are visible for many miles.{St Bart's}dates from the 15C, restored in 1885.{St Mary's}was built in 1874.{The Manor House,}which dated from the early 12C had its site near the present{St Mary's primary school.} {The Victorian baths}were next door to Squires Walk-if you look closely you can see the original tiles.
